mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.COMMENTS_NO, A.ID, A.GALLERY_BOARD_NO, A.CREATE_DATE, A.COMM_CONTENT, A.IP, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC,DEPTH ASC, CREATE_DATE DESC)AS ROW_NUM, COMMENTS_NO, ID, GALLERY_BOARD_NO, CREATE_DATE, COMM_CONTENT, IP, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO FROM COMMENTS WHERE GALLERY_BOARD_NO=#{galleryBoardNo}) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
